content.description: Which of the following code segments can be used to set the value of the string str to "Good morning, sunshine!" ?
content.question: String str = "Good " + "morning," + " sunshine!";String str = "Good";str += " morning, sunshine!";String str = " morning, ";str = "Good" + str + "sunshine!";

skill.text: 2.A: Write program code to implement an algorithm.
